name: Shakir
text: Glory be to Him Who made His servant to go on a night from the Sacred Mosque to the remote mosque of which We have blessed the precincts, so that We may show to him some of Our signs; surely He is the Hearing, the Seeing.

name: Shakir
text: And We gave Musa the Book and made it a guidance to the children of Israel, saying: Do not take a protector besides Me;

name: Shakir
text: The offspring of those whom We bore with Nuh; surely he was a grateful servant.

name: Shakir
text: And We had made known to the children of Israel in the Book: Most certainly you will make mischief in the land twice, and most certainly you will behave insolently with great insolence.

name: Shakir
text: So when the promise for the first of the two came, We sent over you Our servants, of mighty prowess, so they went to and fro among the houses, and it was a promise to be accomplished.

name: Shakir
text: Then We gave you back the turn to prevail against them, and aided you with wealth and children and made you a numerous band.

name: Shakir
text: If you do good, you will do good for your own souls, and if you do evil, it shall be for them. So when the second promise came (We raised another people) that they may bring you to grief and that they may enter the mosque as they entered it the first time, and that they might destroy whatever they gained ascendancy over with utter destruction.

name: Shakir
text: It may be that your Lord will have mercy on you, and if you again return (to disobedience) We too will return (to punishment), and We have made hell a prison for the unbelievers.

name: Shakir
text: Surely this Quran guides to that which is most upright and gives good news to the believers who do good that they shall have a great reward.

name: Shakir
text: And that (as for) those who do not believe in the hereafter, We have prepared for them a painful chastisement.

name: Shakir
text: And man prays for evil as he ought to pray for good, and man is ever hasty.

name: Shakir
text: And We have made the night and the day two signs, then We have made the sign of the night to pass away and We have made the sign of the day manifest, so that you may seek grace from your Lord, and that you might know the numbering of years and the reckoning; and We have explained everything with distinctness.

name: Shakir
text: And We have made every man's actions to cling to his neck, and We will bring forth to him on the resurrection day a book which he will find wide open:

name: Shakir
text: Read your book; your own self is sufficient as a reckoner against you this day.

name: Shakir
text: Whoever goes aright, for his own soul does he go aright; and whoever goes astray, to its detriment only does he go astray: nor can the bearer of a burden bear the burden of another, nor do We chastise until We raise an apostle.

name: Shakir
text: And when We wish to destroy a town, We send Our commandment to the people of it who lead easy lives, but they transgress therein; thus the word proves true against it, so We destroy it with utter destruction.

name: Shakir
text: And how many of the generations did We destroy after Nuh! and your Lord is sufficient as Knowing and Seeing with regard to His servants' faults.

name: Shakir
text: Whoever desires this present life, We hasten to him therein what We please for whomsoever We desire, then We assign to him the hell; he shall enter it despised, driven away.

name: Shakir
text: And whoever desires the hereafter and strives for it as he ought to strive and he is a believer; (as for) these, their striving shall surely be accepted.

name: Shakir
text: All do We aid-- these as well as those-- out of the bounty of your Lord, and the bounty of your Lord is not confined.

name: Shakir
text: See how We have made some of them to excel others, and certainly the hereafter is much superior in respect of excellence.

name: Shakir
text: Do not associate with Allah any other god, lest you sit down despised, neglected.

name: Shakir
text: And your Lord has commanded that you shall not serve (any) but Him, and goodness to your parents. If either or both of them reach old age with you, say not to them (so much as) "Ugh" nor chide them, and speak to them a generous word.

name: Shakir
text: And make yourself submissively gentle to them with compassion, and say: O my Lord! have compassion on them, as they brought me up (when I was) little.

name: Shakir
text: Your Lord knows best what is in your minds; if you are good, then He is surely Forgiving to those who turn (to Him) frequently.

name: Shakir
text: And give to the near of kin his due and (to) the needy and the wayfarer, and do not squander wastefully.

name: Shakir
text: Surely the squanderers are the fellows of the Shaitans and the Shaitan is ever ungrateful to his Lord.

name: Shakir
text: And if you turn away from them to seek mercy from your Lord, which you hope for, speak to them a gentle word.

name: Shakir
text: And do not make your hand to be shackled to your neck nor stretch it forth to the utmost (limit) of its stretching forth, lest you should (afterwards) sit down blamed, stripped off.

name: Shakir
text: Surely your Lord makes plentiful the means of subsistence for whom He pleases and He straitens (them); surely He is ever Aware of, Seeing, His servants.

name: Shakir
text: And do not kill your children for fear of poverty; We give them sustenance and yourselves (too); surely to kill them is a great wrong.

name: Shakir
text: And go not nigh to fornication; surely it is an indecency and an evil way.

name: Shakir
text: And do not kill any one whom Allah has forbidden, except for a just cause, and whoever is slain unjustly, We have indeed given to his heir authority, so let him not exceed the just limits in slaying; surely he is aided.

name: Shakir
text: And draw not near to the property of the orphan except in a goodly way till he attains his maturity and fulfill the promise; surely (every) promise shall be questioned about.

name: Shakir
text: And give full measure when you measure out, and weigh with a true balance; this is fair and better in the end.

name: Shakir
text: And follow not that of which you have not the knowledge; surely the hearing and the sight and the heart, all of these, shall be questioned about that.

name: Shakir
text: And do not go about in the land exultingly, for you cannot cut through the earth nor reach the mountains in height.

name: Shakir
text: All this-- the evil of it-- is hateful in the sight of your Lord.

name: Shakir
text: This is of what your Lord has revealed to you of wisdom, and do not associate any other god with Allah lest you should be thrown into hell, blamed, cast away.

name: Shakir
text: What! has then your Lord preferred to give you sons, and (for Himself) taken daughters from among the angels? Most surely you utter a grievous saying.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We have repeated (warnings) in this Quran that they may be mindful, but it does not add save to their aversion.

name: Shakir
text: Say: If there were with Him gods as they say, then certainly they would have been able to seek a way to the Lord of power.

name: Shakir
text: Glory be to Him and exalted be He in high exaltation above what they say.

name: Shakir
text: The seven heavens declare His glory and the earth (too), and those who are in them; and there is not a single thing but glorifies Him with His praise, but you do not understand their glorification; surely He is Forbearing, Forgiving.

name: Shakir
text: And when you recite the Quran, We place between you and those who do not believe in the hereafter a hidden barrier;

name: Shakir
text: And We have placed coverings on their hearts and a heaviness in their ears lest they understand it, and when you mention your Lord alone in the Quran they turn their backs in aversion.

name: Shakir
text: We know best what they listen to when they listen to you, and when they take counsel secretly, when the unjust say: You follow only a man deprived of reason.

name: Shakir
text: See what they liken you to! So they have gone astray and cannot find the way.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: What! when we shall have become bones and decayed particles, shall we then certainly be raised up, being a new creation?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Become stones or iron,

name: Shakir
text: Or some other creature of those which are too hard (to receive life) in your minds! But they will say: Who will return us? Say: Who created you at first. Still they will shake their heads at you and say: When will it be? Say: Maybe it has drawn nigh.

name: Shakir
text: On the day when He will call you forth, then shall you obey Him, giving Him praise, and you will think that you tarried but a little (while).

name: Shakir
text: And say to My servants (that) they speak that which is best; surely the Shaitan sows dissensions among them; surely the Shaitan is an open enemy to man.

name: Shakir
text: Your Lord knows you best; He will have mercy on you if He pleases, or He will chastise you if He pleases; and We have not sent you as being in charge of them.

name: Shakir
text: And your Lord best knows those who are in the heavens and the earth; and certainly We have made some of the prophets to excel others, and to Dawood We gave a scripture.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Call on those whom you assert besides Him, so they shall not control the removal of distress from you nor (its) transference.

name: Shakir
text: Those whom they call upon, themselves seek the means of access to their Lord-- whoever of them is nearest-- and they hope for His mercy and fear His chastisement; surely the chastisement of your Lord is a thing to be cautious of.

name: Shakir
text: And there is not a town but We will destroy it before the day of resurrection or chastise it with a severe chastisement; this is written in the Divine ordinance.

name: Shakir
text: And nothing could have hindered Us that We should send signs except that the ancients rejected them; and We gave to Samood the she-camel-- a manifest sign-- but on her account they did injustice, and We do not send signs but to make (men) fear.

name: Shakir
text: And when We said to you: Surely your Lord encompasses men; and We did not make the vision which We showed you but a trial for men and the cursed tree in the Quran as well; and We cause them to fear, but it only adds to their great inordinacy.

name: Shakir
text: And when We said to the angels: Make obeisance to Adam; they made obeisance, but Iblis (did it not). He said: Shall I make obeisance to him whom Thou hast created of dust?

name: Shakir
text: He said: Tell me, is this he whom Thou hast honored above me? If Thou shouldst respite me to the day of resurrection, I will most certainly cause his progeny to perish except a few.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Be gone! for whoever of them will follow you, then surely hell is your recompense, a full recompense:

name: Shakir
text: And beguile whomsoever of them you can with your voice, and collect against them your forces riding and on foot, and share with them in wealth and children, and hold out promises to them; and the Shaitan makes not promises to them but to deceive:

name: Shakir
text: Surely (as for) My servants, you have no authority over them; and your Lord is sufficient as a Protector.

name: Shakir
text: Your Lord is He Who speeds the ships for you in the sea that you may seek of His grace; surely He is ever Merciful to you.

name: Shakir
text: And when distress afflicts you in the sea, away go those whom you call on except He; but when He brings you safe to the land, you turn aside; and man is ever ungrateful.

name: Shakir
text: What! Do you then feel secure that He will not cause a tract of land to engulf you or send on you a tornado? Then you shall not find a protector for yourselves.

name: Shakir
text: Or, do you feel secure that He will (not) take you back into it another time, then send on you a fierce gale and thus drown you on account of your ungratefulness? Then you shall not find any aider against Us in the matter.

name: Shakir
text: And surely We have honored the children of Adam, and We carry them in the land and the sea, and We have given them of the good things, and We have made them to excel by an appropriate excellence over most of those whom We have created.

name: Shakir
text: (Remember) the day when We will call every people with their Imam; then whoever is given his book in his right hand, these shall read their book; and they shall not be dealt with a whit unjustly.

name: Shakir
text: And whoever is blind in this, he shall (also) be blind in the hereafter; and more erring from the way.

name: Shakir
text: And surely they had purposed to turn you away from that which We have revealed to you, that you should forge against Us other than that, and then they would certainly have taken you for a friend.

name: Shakir
text: And had it not been that We had already established you, you would certainly have been near to incline to them a little;

name: Shakir
text: In that case We would certainly have made you to taste a double (punishment) in this life and a double (punishment) after death, then you would not have found any helper against Us.

name: Shakir
text: And surely they purposed to unsettle you from the land that they might expel you from it, and in that case they will not tarry behind you but a little.

name: Shakir
text: (This is Our) course with regard to those of Our apostles whom We sent before you, and you shall not find a change in Our course.

name: Shakir
text: Keep up prayer from the declining of the sun till the darkness of the night and the morning recitation; surely the morning recitation is witnessed.

name: Shakir
text: And during a part of the night, pray Tahajjud beyond what is incumbent on you; maybe your Lord will raise you to a position of great glory.

name: Shakir
text: And say: My Lord! make me to enter a goodly entering, and cause me to go forth a goodly going forth, and grant me from near Thee power to assist (me).

name: Shakir
text: And say: The truth has come and the falsehood has vanished; surely falsehood is a vanishing (thing).

name: Shakir
text: And We reveal of the Quran that which is a healing and a mercy to the believers, and it adds only to the perdition of the unjust.

name: Shakir
text: And when We bestow favor on man, he turns aside and behaves proudly, and when evil afflicts him, he is despairing.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Every one acts according to his manner; but your Lord best knows who is best guided in the path.

name: Shakir
text: And they ask you about the soul. Say: The soul is one of the commands of my Lord, and you are not given aught of knowledge but a little.

name: Shakir
text: And if We please, We should certainly take away that which We have revealed to you, then you would not find for it any protector against Us.

name: Shakir
text: But on account of mercy from your Lord-- surely His grace to you is abundant.

name: Shakir
text: Say: If men and jinn should combine together to bring the like of this Quran, they could not bring the like of it, though some of them were aiders of others.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We have explained for men in this Quran every kind of similitude, but most men do not consent to aught but denying.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: We will by no means believe in you until you cause a fountain to gush forth from the earth for us.

name: Shakir
text: Or you should have a garden of palms and grapes in the midst of which you should cause rivers to flow forth, gushing out.

name: Shakir
text: Or you should cause the heaven to come down upon us in pieces as you think, or bring Allah and the angels face to face (with us).

name: Shakir
text: Or you should have a house of gold, or you should ascend into heaven, and we will not believe in your ascending until you bring down to us a book which we may read. Say: Glory be to my Lord; am I aught but a mortal apostle?

name: Shakir
text: And nothing prevented people from believing when the guidance came to them except that they said: What! has Allah raised up a mortal to be an apostle?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Had there been in the earth angels walking about as settlers, We would certainly have sent down to them from the heaven an angel as an apostle.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Allah suffices as a witness between me and you; surely He is Aware of His servants, Seeing.

name: Shakir
text: And whomsoever Allah guides, he is the follower of the right way, and whomsoever He causes to err, you shall not find for him guardians besides Him; and We will gather them together on the day of resurrection on their faces, blind and dumb and deaf; their abode is hell; whenever it becomes allayed We will add to their burning.

name: Shakir
text: This is their retribution because they disbelieved in Our communications and said What! when we shall have become bones and decayed particles, shall we then indeed be raised up into a new creation?

name: Shakir
text: Do they not consider that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth, is able to create their like, and He has appointed for them a doom about which there is no doubt? But the unjust do not consent to aught but denying.

name: Shakir
text: Say: If you control the treasures of the mercy of my Lord, then you would withhold (them) from fear of spending, and man is niggardly.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We gave Musa nine clear signs; so ask the children of Israel. When he came to them, Firon said to him: Most surely I deem you, O Musa, to be a man deprived of reason.

name: Shakir
text: He said: Truly you know that none but the Lord of the heavens and the earth has sent down these as clear proof and most surely I believe you, O Firon, to be given over to perdition.

name: Shakir
text: So he desired to destroy them out of the earth, but We drowned him and those with him all together;

name: Shakir
text: And We said to the Israelites after him: Dwell in the land: and when the promise of the next life shall come to pass, we will bring you both together in judgment.

name: Shakir
text: And with truth have We revealed it, and with truth did it come; and We have not sent you but as the giver of good news and as a warner.

name: Shakir
text: And it is a Quran which We have revealed in portions so that you may read it to the people by slow degrees, and We have revealed it, revealing in portions.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Believe in it or believe not; surely those who are given the knowledge before it fall down on their faces, making obeisance when it is recited to them.

name: Shakir
text: And they say: Glory be to our Lord! most surely the promise of our Lord was to be fulfilled.

name: Shakir
text: And they fall down on their faces weeping, and it adds to their humility.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Call upon Allah or call upon, the Beneficent Allah; whichever you call upon, He has the best names; and do not utter your prayer with a very raised voice nor be silent with regard to it, and seek a way between these.

name: Shakir
text: And say: (All) praise is due to Allah, Who has not taken a son and Who has not a partner in the kingdom, and Who has not a helper to save Him from disgrace; and proclaim His greatness magnifying (Him).
